resources.string: This channel shows scan progress. You may safely hide this notification.
We will help you stay focused on your tasks, and not get distracted! But first, let us set this app up!
We want to show you notifications when we are scanning your files. We wont spam you!
You are now ready to start! Enjoy your interruption free time! We have already created a few settings for you.
Round Sync relies on rclone and needs your permission to access all files. Please grant storage access when prompted, otherwise the application will not work properly.
We use usage statistics to calculate the diskusage by your apps.
